page.title: 15A Local Shop Survives
page.content: There was only one shop in our area : a general store,newsagents and confectioners at Langford.The shopkeeper had been able to survive the competition from the supermarkets of nerby towns but life was difficult. She survived by keeping items people needed everyday,like milk and beans and could not run out of and so needed to shop locally.Sweets,Newspapers and Icecreams brought in people passing through the village who also bought other items.The shop was a friendly meeting place for people who liked to chat and shop.
